item.description: Some tall folks will be attending the annual Boars Head and Yule Log Festival at Asylum Hill Congregational Church. The Boars Head Festival is an old English tradition and a celebration of the Epiphany. It's a pageant with wonderful music, medieval costumes and live animals, all in the church sanctuary. (Vist www.ahcc.org for more information.) We'll be attending the 3:00 PM show. Tickets for this event will sell out, so if you wish to attend, you must call the church at 525-5696 and order your tickets -- $15 each for general admission. Then reply here so we can make plans to connect before the show starts.
item.name: Boars Head and Yule Log Festival
